public ref class EventSetterHandlerConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 将事件 setter 处理程序的字符串名称转换为委托表示形式。

span.span: Converts the string name of an event setter handler to a delegate representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 WPF XAML 如何处理事件处理程序名称的详细信息，请参阅[Xaml 概述（WPF）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf)。For more information about how XAML for WPF processes event handler names, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf).
